ygData.subject: Re: [neat] New paper: Automated Generation of Environments to Test the General Learning Capabilities of AI Agents
ygData.msgSnippet: Jeff, I just wanted to qualify what you said about self-adaptive mutation rates being a terrible idea. I think this is one of those topics that is complicated
